name: Tartaglia
desc:
"Childe" Tartaglia

Should this table be considered a battlefield, then may the strongest claim the win.

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color>
Switches to <color=#ffffff>Melee Stance</color> and deals 2 <color=#80c0ff>Hydro DMG</color> , and attach Riptide to the target character.
<color=#ece5d8>Melee Stance</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>Physical DMG</color> dealt by character is converted to <color=#80c0ff>Hydro DMG</color> .
<color=#ffffff>After the character uses Charged Attack:</color> Apply <color=#ffffff>Riptide</color> to target character.
Character deals +1 DMG to target characters with <color=#ffffff>Riptide</color> attached.
<color=#ffffff>After Skills are used against characters affected by Riptide</color> : Deal 1 <color=#ffffff>Piercing DMG</color> to the next opposing off-field character. (Twice per Round)
<color=#ffffff>Duration (Rounds): 2</color>
<color=#ece5d8>Riptide</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>When the character to which this is attached is defeated</color> : Apply Riptide to active character.
(When <color=#ffffff>Tartaglia</color> is in <color=#ffffff>Melee Stance</color> , he will deal additional DMG when attacking the character to which this is attached.)

<color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color>
Performs different attacks based on the current stance that <color=#ffffff>Tartaglia</color> is in.
<color=#ffffff>Ranged Stance - Flash of Havoc:</color> Deal 5 <color=#80c0ff>Hydro DMG</color> , reclaim 2 <color=#ffffff>Energy</color> , and apply <color=#ffffff>Riptide</color> to the target character.
<color=#ffffff>Melee Stance - Light of Obliteration:</color> Deal 7 <color=#80c0ff>Hydro DMG</color> .
<color=#ece5d8>Riptide</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>When the character to which this is attached is defeated</color> : Apply Riptide to active character.
(When <color=#ffffff>Tartaglia</color> is in <color=#ffffff>Melee Stance</color> , he will deal additional DMG when attacking the character to which this is attached.)

<color=#ffd780>Passive Skill</color>
(Passive) When the battle begins, this character gains <color=#ffffff>Ranged Stance</color> . Once the <color=#ffffff>Melee Stance</color> attached to the character ends, reapplies <color=#ffffff>Ranged Stance</color> .
<color=#ece5d8>Ranged Stance</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>After the character to which this is attached uses Charged Attack</color> : Apply <color=#ffffff>Riptide</color> to target character.
<color=#ece5d8>Riptide</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>When the character to which this is attached is defeated</color> : Apply Riptide to active character.
(When <color=#ffffff>Tartaglia</color> is in <color=#ffffff>Melee Stance</color> , he will deal additional DMG when attacking the character to which this is attached.)
<color=#ffffff>Duration (Rounds): 2</color>
<color=#ece5d8>Melee Stance</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>Physical DMG</color> dealt by character is converted to <color=#80c0ff>Hydro DMG</color> .
<color=#ffffff>After the character uses Charged Attack:</color> Apply <color=#ffffff>Riptide</color> to target character.
Character deals +1 DMG to target characters with <color=#ffffff>Riptide</color> attached.
<color=#ffffff>After Skills are used against characters affected by Riptide</color> : Deal 1 <color=#ffffff>Piercing DMG</color> to the next opposing off-field character. (Twice per Round)
<color=#ffffff>Duration (Rounds): 2</color>

Applies Hydro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> <color=#ffffff>+</color> <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> <color=#ffffff>] Vaporize</color> : DMG +2 for this instance
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> <color=#ffffff>+</color> <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> <color=#ffffff>] Electro-Charged</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> <color=#ffffff>+</color> <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> <color=#ffffff>] Frozen</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, the target is unable to perform any Actions this Round (Can be removed in advance after the target receives +2 Physical or Pyro DMG)
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> <color=#ffffff>+</color> <color=#99ff88>Dendro</color> <color=#ffffff>] Bloom</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [ <color=#ffffff>Dendro Core</color> ] that grants +2 DMG to the next instance of Pyro or Electro DMG

<color=#ece5d8>Physical DMG</color>
Physical DMG will not apply any Elements, nor can it engage in Elemental Reactions.
<color=#ece5d8>Charged Attack</color>
Before your Action Phase, should the total number of your Elemental Dice be even, your Normal Attack will be considered a Charged Attack.
<color=#ece5d8>Piercing DMG</color>
Piercing DMG cannot be increased by any bonuses, but cannot be defended against using Shields or DMG Immunity either.
<color=#ece5d8>Duration (Rounds)</color>
Each time you reach the end of a Round, <color=#ffffff>Duration (Rounds)</color> -1.
This card will be discarded immediately once <color=#ffffff>Duration (Rounds)</color> runs out.
<color=#ece5d8>Energy</color>
Characters must consume Energy to use their Elemental Bursts.
When characters use an Elemental Skill or a Normal Attack, they will gain 1 Energy.

customize.name: Tartaglia
customize.desc:
"Childe" Tartaglia

Should this table be considered a battlefield, then may the strongest claim the win.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: Can also be exchanged using a

customize.name: Blank Dynamic Card
customize.desc: A blank card with a painted back. It is said that if you put the name of your desired dynamic card on this blank card, you can get the very skin from the Association agent located at the tavern.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Hahaha! I consider cards a form of battle as well, so don't expect me to go easy on you, now!"
<color=#ccbfad>Hint: Tartaglia's deck contains a combination of Fatui characters and Event Cards that allows him to unleash a high-intensity offensive during the early stages of the match.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Tartaglia
customize.desc:
"Childe" Tartaglia

Should this table be considered a battlefield, then may the strongest claim the win.

customize.name: Fatui Cryo Cicin Mage
customize.desc:
"Cicin of the Hollow Mist" Cryo Cicin Mage

And so long as the Mist Grass yet lingers, the Cryo Cicins will not abandon her.

customize.name: Fatui Pyro Agent
customize.desc:
"Blade of Settlement" Agent

"There is no running from your debt, be you living or otherwise."

customize.name: Match Invitation Letter
customize.desc: You can select a player from the Player List via the invitation board, and then entrust The Cat's Tail to send out an invitation using this Invitation Letter. The invited player will head over to the tavern and wait for a duel with you.

customize.name: Tartaglia

customize.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Achieve victory with characters defeated less than twice during the battle</color>

customize.text:

"Ah! What a satisfying showdown! Looks like I'll need to get a little more serious now!"
